name: Pilgrim Inn and Cottages

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was adequate but we wish we didn't have to stay there. We tried to cancel 48 hours in advance and they denied it stating their policy was 3 weeks in advance. The cottages sit on top of a hill but at the bottom is the freeway. Despite the cool temps at night we had to keep the fan on the a/c running to drown out the trucks on the highway. No, I would not recommend this place.
reviews.title: beware of cancellation policy

reviews.text: I stayed here for one night because the red roof inn across the street was full. The inn looked ok from the outside. They told me all they had was a cabin available for 118.00 a night so I took it even though I thought it was a bit high considering they didn't even have a pool. As I was bringing a few of my things into the cabin the owners children all came over and watched.The cabin wasn't really a cabin it was a detached hotel room. It was very run down but pretty clean.It had 2 double beds and a very old fridge and microwave. The furniture looked like it was all found at yard sales mismatched and saggy.each window had a curtain that was too small for it. The bathroom was very small with a very homemade shower the walls didn't touch anything so water went everywhere. spiders in the corners in the bathroom.They had a free cont. breakfast that consisted of coffee and fruitloops but they had no milk to offer. They had an ice machine outside with some bugs in it and a soda machine.Most of the cabins have people living in them year round. I asked the owners about some local places near by but they weren't very helpful and it was very hard to understand them. I will never stay here again.
reviews.title: Very overpriced

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Don't stay there !!! We found bottom hair on the toilet seat when we arrived and the outside door would open instantly whenever there was a tiny wind blowing. The door knob was sticky and the whole room was dirty.
reviews.title: Dirty, sticky, smelly place

likes.disliked: — Dirty and owners who could not care less

reviews.title: Okay if you don't mind mice
reviews.text: When mentioned to the owner, she said it was not her problem.

description: Welcome to Pilgrim Inn & Cottages, New Hampshire located in the heart of the Lake Region. Clean comfortable, renovated rooms and Friendly service. Savor each of our Seasons and experience our warm hospitality
